description:
Description

THE ROLE

We are currently looking for a Buyer to join our PrettyLittleThing team in Los Angeles, to support with the growth of our LA office. Within this role at Pretty Little Thing, you'll be accountable for the day to day running of the department, ensuring all product is delivered to a high standard for our customer. As a Buyer you will work alongside our Buying Manager, as well as working closely with your peers in Design and Merchandising.

YOUR TEAM

Welcome to our world. We are PrettyLittleThing; the brand taking over your social media feeds with our next-level aesthetic that’ll have you double tapping. We believe style should be accessible to all, whatever your budget, as we deliver product inspired from the catwalk and the coolest muses of the moment. Our customer knows they can trust in us for everything they need from the latest trend-led pieces to celebrity inspired looks, to the everyday wardrobe staples and that ultimate party piece.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Undertakes product development and develops proposition as area of business grows.
  • Ensures proposition can deliver required international growth and maintains understanding of requirements of new territories.
  • Works in conjunction with the Senior Leadership team, to influence strategic plans and developments.
  • Ensures effective communication with junior, assistant, and trainee buyers in designates areas and across the entire department.
  • Monitors stock covers on single lines.
  • Reports and effectively communicates all key information in trading meeting to Heads and Director level.
  • Generates ideas and suggestion to impact the business with reference to promotions and mark downs.
  • Monitors and maintains stocks as per KPI’s set and manages open to buy accordingly.
  • Responds to competitor analysis.
  • Completes buying trips as needed within UK and internationally.
  • Liaises with marketing and eCommerce teams to develop and maintain professional working relationships and ensure sales are maximised through the site and in line with overall strategy.

More About You

As a Buyer at PLT you will have:

  • Previous experience at Buyer or Associate Buyer level.
  • Experience working across multiple deadlines and ability to manage your workload effectively.
  • Outstanding industry knowledge, be current and ahead at identifying trends and commercial wins for the brand
  • Ability to support and develop your wider team and always ensuring you are approachable to the wider teams.
  • You’re committed and focused on your role, bringing your best energy every day. Your energy has a positive impact on the whole team.
  • Experience of developing and mentoring junior team members
  • Excellent interpersonal skills, with the ability to communicate at all levels
  • Able to travel when the business require

WORKING WITH US

To succeed here, you have to love working at pace. It’s relentless, but we love it. Change is a certainty – you need to adapt and be agile. We want you to challenge the status quo, innovate and be open to trying new things. We’re always pushing boundaries. We empower our people, giving them freedom and autonomy to learn and grow in their roles. We’re passionate, agile, creative and one team.

WHY JOIN US

We know that as a company we are only as good as the people that we employ. We know our employees work tirelessly to make PLT the success it is today and in turn, we offer them some amazing benefits:

  • 40% Staff Discount On All Boohoo Group Brands
  • Flexible Working Hours + Late Start Early Finish Fridays
  • Discretionary Bonus Scheme
  • Medical Insurance – 100% PLT Contributed
  • Dental Insurance – 100% PLT Contributed
  • Vision – 100% PLT Contributed
  • 401K Pension
  • 15 Days Paid Vacation Days
  • Paid Sick Days
  • Monthly Payday Drinks And Ad Hoc Events Throughout The Year
  • Clothing Allowance
  • Learning And Development Support And Opportunities
  • Competitive Family Friendly Policies
  • Local Discounts + Discount Portal
  • Valet Parking
  • Employee Referral Programme
